snippet.title: Channeling the Piano Man: a preview of the Rock Band 3 keyboard
snippet.description: ...Rhythm games have been run into the ground, with multiple releases in multiple franchises choking retail shelves with plastic guitars and marked-down prices. Rock Band 3 has a hard road ahead of it, with the Guitar Hero series having already released DJ Hero 2 to good reviews, and more hardware being sold to gamers in order to take advantage of the "Pro" experience.
